content: the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology ✩ skill level easy crochet pattern + you should know basic crochet stitches including chain single_crochet increase decrease slip_stitch and crochet in front loops only and back loops only ✩ size the teddy bear is approx 4 5 inches tall materials sport weight yarn in beige brown and bright for example yellow or red colors crochet hook 2 5 mm fiberfill for stuffing scissors sewing needle eyes
